column1: Kata Robata////In terms of comparison to other Japanese restaurants and their omakase... I've really only had omakase here and at MF Sushi. I can't compare which one was better
column2: because they were both very different. If you are looking at pure sushi omakase
column3: I would recommend MF just because they focus so much on the basic flavor of the fish. If you're looking for some sushi and some traditional Japanese dishes
column4: come to Kata Robata. Quality of the food is superb at both places.
